snippet: Mike Krzyzewski, the Team USA coach, said that if the lockout continued, it would have a significant impact on preparations for the 2012 Games.
lead_paragraph: Mike Krzyzewski, the Team USA coach, said that if the lockout continued, it would have a significant impact on preparations for the 2012 Games.

headline.main: N.B.A. Lockout Creating Uncertainty for U.S. Olympic Team
